weeklyTopNews.title: Victoria records 12 new cases as Daniel Andrews promises 'steady and safe steps' to ease restrictions
weeklyTopNews.summary: Victoria recorded 12 new cases and 2 deaths today. The state's 14-day rolling case average is now 26.7, well below the 30 to 50 target set to enable the easing of restrictions from Monday.

weeklyTopNews.title: South Australia reopens to NSW residents as Queensland widens southern border bubble
weeklyTopNews.summary: Both NSW and Queensland are set to relax border restrictions with NSW after the state recorded zero locally acquired cases.

weeklyTopNews.title: 'This is a good day,' says Victoria's Daniel Andrews as Covid-19 cases drop to 14
weeklyTopNews.summary: Professor Brett Sutton, Victoria's Chief Health Officer, described the number as "very good". Metropolitan Melbourne's 14 day average is now down to 36. The target set for the next round of easing of restrictions as 50.
